document_data.name: Blaizette
document_data.mainbody: '''Blaizette''' was a [[halfling]] waitress in [[Phlan]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Blaizette worked as waitress for her mother at the [[Madame Freona's Tea Kettle]].
document_data.Relationships: She was the daughter of Madame [[Freona]], the Tea Kettle's owner and proprietor.{{Cite adventurers league/Defiance in Phlan|11}} [[Grelinda]],{{Cite adventurers league/Defiance in Phlan|17}} [[Reece]],{{Cite adventurers league/Defiance in Phlan|6}} and [[Whittlee]].{{Cite adventurers league/Defiance in Phlan|27}}
document_data.History: In the 1480s DR,{{ToD-time}} she was briefly interrogated by [[Buhrell Caah]] about a missing dangerous magic item.{{Cite adventurers league/Defiance in Phlan|23}}
